                           Release Notes

Comments :
Frank Hopkins was a rider for the U.S.Army, who was at the Battle of 
Wounded Knee. This haunts his life, and he copes by turning to the bottle. 
He joins Buffalo Bill&#039;s Wild West Show, and is billed as the greatest 
horseman of his generation. Hidalgo is also billed as the greatest horse in 
the world due to the countless races he has won. But an Arab questions that 
claim, they have not competed in a race like the Oceans of Fire. Hopkins 
decides to join it. He travels to the Middle East to enter and gets to face 
some of the demons that plague him.

Director : Joe Johnston

Writer: John Fusco (written by)
